title: Faleh Abed Hajim
text:
Faleh Abed Hajim (1 July 1946) is an <a href="Iraqi%20people">Iraqi</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a> who played for <a href="Iraq%20national%20football%20team">Iraq</a> between 1969 and 1971. He also played for <a href="Diwaniya%20FC">Al-Diwaniya</a>.
Career statistics.
International goals.
"Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first."
